definition.text: Superalgos is an awesome but also huge project you should be ready to invest a lot of hours in to it if you want to start using it successfully.

paragraphs.text: I'm a programmer and I don't have a lot of experience in trading or running bots. Because of my lack of experience even after going through the first two tutorials I don't think I understand enough to start using superalgos.

Putting my lack of experience aside, the tutorialas are awesome both in design and the knowladge they provide. I love the design of the platform in general and looking at the source code I can tell that this is a huge project with a lot of potential.
